question.title: How to extract all chapters from a PDF into a list using Apache PDFBox?
question.body:
I'm trying to extract text from a PDF and populate all the chapters (or sections) into a List in Java. I want each chapter as a separate element in the list.

I'm using Apache PDFBox. I can extract all the text using PDFTextStripper, but I'm not sure how to split it into chapters. My PDF has headings like "Chapter 1", "Chapter 2", etc.

What i have tried :

PDDocument document = PDDocument.load(new File("example.pdf"));
PDFTextStripper pdfStripper = new PDFTextStripper();
String text = pdfStripper.getText(document);
document.close();
System.out.println(text);

This gives me all the text, but I want something like:

List<String> chapters = ["Chapter 1 text...", "Chapter 2 text...", ...];

question_comments.body: "This gives me all the text, but I want something like" - and what exactly keeps you from creating that list from the text?
